title: Salman Al Saud
author: Salman Al Saud
created_time: September 17, 2023, 10:28:18 AMLast edit: September 17, 2023, 10:54:30 AM by Salman Al Saud
content: It's really hard to think that @Joeri Pross is no longer with us. His wife left the children and went to the country of no return. https://img001.prntscr.com/file/img001/4jsU15WORlSu0fpbJ3UHTA.pngWe pray for his departed soul to rest in peace. Below is its summary. •BitcoinTalk member Zoeri (Zori Pross) has died leaving behind a wife and 2 young children. •He is an old user of the forum and has been a community manager for many projects such as Factom. •He went missing on August 30 and his body was found on September 2. A "GoFundMe" has been started for his wife and children and has already attracted 585 donations and €18,315. Anyone can stand by his family if he wants. To know more about him, visit the links below. 1. https://hypercube-agency.com/in-memory-of-joeri-pross/ 2. https://www.noordhollandsdagblad.nl/cnt/dmf20230902_298446753. https://www.noordhollandsdagblad.nl/cnt/dmf20230904_76160519
